item.title: AWS Broken Pipe on SSH Connection
item.description: Notes for AWS EC2 Setting Write Failed: Broken Pipe When I tried to use screen command to link to AWS EC2, it broken easily and my website stopped. And the following error message showed up: Write Failed: broken pipe So I found this solution, and tried both client and server configuration. For client configuration: Try creating the file: ~/.ssh/config Add the contents: Host * ServerAliveInterval 30 ServerAliveCountMax 5 For server configuration:
